name: Theme Park Worker
description:
Theme Park Worker is a simulation game about theme parks. You work in an amusement park and are responsible for the attractions that you can freely choose in this open-world game. This concept has not existed yet.
The features:
  • freely accessible Open World game world
  • game world full of details
  • Control your attractions
  • be yourself a visitor, take a seat and drive with some attractions[/ list]

    currently open attractions in our park:
    • Westernexpress
    • Autoscooter
    • Bull-Riding
    • Floßfahrt
    • Break Dance No3
    • Free Fall Tower
    • Märchenkarussel
    • Märchenwirbel
    • Wildwasserbahn



    See you soon in the park!
